posts.text:
Góðan daginn
Langar að athuga hvort einhver vilji kaupa Nvidia Quadro M4000 skjákort.
SPECIFICATIONS
GPU Memory: 8 GB GDDR5
Memory Interface:  256-bit
Memory Bandwidth:  192 GB/s
NVIDIA CUDA® Cores:  1664
System Interface PCI Express 3.0 x16
Max Power Consumption 120 W
Thermal Solution Active
Form Factor 4.4” H × 9.5” L,
Single Slot, Full Height
Display Connectors 4x DP 1.2
Max Simultaneous Displays: 4 direct, 4 DP 1.2 
Multi-Stream
Max DP 1.2 Resolution 4096 × 2160 at 60 Hz
Max VGA Resolution 2048 × 1536 at 85 Hz
Graphics APIs Shader Model 5.0,
OpenGL 4.54
DirectX 12.05
Compute APIs CUDA, Direct
Verð
hugmynd
: 100.000.-
nú eða tilboð.
